channel.title: I tryed and failed ;(
channel.description: Hello i here to tell toy about my offline server problems. First off my server stores all the char files in a .dat file extention that i cannot read. The only thing i can read from the file is the users name and password. I need to know how to uncompile this file or how to set the rights on it. If you need a sample .dat file from my server i can send you one. Also i have look on these forums on how to uncompile them and none of them help or didnt state how. If you have any ideas or solutions to this problem please reply asap. Thanks.

item.title: I tryed and failed ;(
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:528342”][quote author=JDETSC link=topic=647091.msg4353874#msg4353874 date=1377129701]
Add this in client.java (PI)
Don’t add the method init.

public void initialize () { if (c.playerName = TechKid) {//not sure how to put this.. c.playerRights = 3; }
[/quote]
Erm, well you’re sort of right.
How you’d want to use the playerName var in a if statement:
if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(String s)){
//Code
}[/quote]use properName plz

Read full topic

item.title: I tryed and failed ;(
item.dc:creator: @Techkid Techkid
item.description:
@Techkid wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Just write your own programs to read the .dat files into a gui or something similar.

Also my server can’t resolve my ip adress that i port forwarded threw no-ip… I tryed to change the dns to robin rounded but i don’t want to upgrade? Can someone help me threw skype or something because all i need is to get this stuff online so i can start to real programming of the game.

item.title: I tryed and failed ;(
item.dc:creator: @Techkid Techkid
item.description:
@Techkid wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:528342”][quote author=N A W R A S link=topic=647091.msg4351683#msg4351683 date=1376763698]
As sk8rdude461 stated, .dat are more secure and faster.
I remember that I used Notepad ++ to edit these files, I’m not 100% sure.

Good luck!
[/quote]
Notepad++ can only decompile them to a point, most IDE’s can read them though (not all can read them properly).[/quote]
Thanks for the help

item.title: I tryed and failed ;(
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Techkid, post:3, topic:528342”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=647091.msg4351676#msg4351676 date=1376763245]
.dat’s are more secure and read faster than text files, it’s actually good they’re stored like that…
To set the rights, just make some commands. And make the command so only you can use it. (Based on playername)
[/quote]

im not sure what my server’s player variable is or where i could find it.[/quote]
I said playername bro.
You know what that is lol.
